summary: A disgraced LAPD detective embarks on a quest to redeem his integrity by finding a missing child.
cast: Sean Apple|Jonah Blechman|Garrett M. Brown|Ann Cusack|Peter Facinelli|Elizabeth Greene|Logan Grove|Chris Hall|Mel Harris|Ken Howard|Billy Lush|Donne McRae|Simone Moore|Sean P. Neelon|Joe Ochman|Blake Robbins|Jim Sharon|Alex Sol
title: Arc
